content.text: I'm a huge country music fan! What are your favorite artists?
I was a country singer before I went into business.
That's awesome! I'm always impressed by people who can sing.
It was fun, but I'm really happy with my business.
What kind of business did you start?
That's a great business to be in! I've heard it can be pretty lucrative.
It can be, but it's also a lot of hard work.
I'm sure it is. I'm not sure I have the patience for it.
It's not for everyone, but it's been a great fit for me.
Well, it sounds like you're doing great. I'm happy for you!
Me too. I'm glad we met!
